summary: **Alien: Isolation (2014)** is a scary game where you play as Amanda Ripley, searching for her mom from the *Alien* movies. It's set on a broken-down space station with a dangerous alien creature loose. You have to hide, outsmart, or fight enemies using tools like a motion tracker. The game looks like the first *Alien* movie and has cool retro-future graphics. It got good reviews and many awards. You can play it on many devices, and there's even a TV show based on it. A sequel is coming soon!
title: Alien Isolation
